main-course.title: Chicken Tikka Masala
main-course.description: Grilled chicken pieces cooked in a creamy tomato-based sauce with spices.

main-course.title: Paneer Butter Masala
main-course.description: Soft paneer cubes cooked in a rich and creamy tomato-based gravy.

main-course.title: Beef Biryani
main-course.description: Fragrant basmati rice cooked with aromatic spices and choice of meat such as chicken, mutton, or beef.

main-course.title: Dal Makhani
main-course.description: Creamy lentils slow-cooked with tomatoes, onions, and spices, finished with cream and butter.

main-course.title: Rogan Josh
main-course.description: Tender lamb or goat meat cooked in a rich and flavorful gravy with aromatic spices.

main-course.title: Chole Bhature
main-course.description: Spicy chickpea curry served with deep-fried bread.

main-course.title: Tandoori Chicken
main-course.description: Chicken marinated in yogurt and spices, cooked in a clay oven.

main-course.title: Palak Paneer
main-course.description: Soft paneer cubes cooked in a creamy spinach gravy.

main-course.title: Aloo Gobi
main-course.description: Potatoes and cauliflower cooked with onions, tomatoes, and spices.

main-course.title: Fish Curry
main-course.description: Fish cooked in a spicy and tangy curry with coconut milk and tamarind.

main-course.title: Mutton Curry
main-course.description: Tender mutton pieces cooked in a flavorful gravy with onions, tomatoes, and spices.

main-course.title: Vegetable Biryani
main-course.description: Fragrant basmati rice cooked with mixed vegetables and aromatic spices.

main-course.title: Butter Chicken
main-course.description: Tender chicken pieces cooked in a creamy tomato-based gravy with butter and spices.

main-course.title: Prawn Curry
main-course.description: Prawns cooked in a flavorful coconut-based curry with spices and herbs.

main-course.title: Mushroom Masala
main-course.description: Button mushrooms cooked in a spicy and tangy tomato-based gravy.

main-course.title: Matar Paneer
main-course.description: A North Indian dish made with peas and paneer cubes cooked in a tomato-based gravy.

main-course.title: Pav Bhaji
main-course.description: A popular street food dish consisting of spicy mashed vegetables served with buttered bread rolls.

main-course.title: Tandoori Fish
main-course.description: Fish marinated in a blend of yogurt and spices, cooked in a tandoor oven until tender and flavorful.

main-course.title: Kadai Paneer
main-course.description: Paneer cubes and bell peppers cooked in a spicy tomato-based gravy with aromatic spices.

main-course.title: Chicken Curry
main-course.description: Tender chicken pieces cooked in a flavorful gravy with onions, tomatoes, and spices.

main-course.title: Aloo Matar
main-course.description: A simple and comforting dish made with potatoes and peas cooked in a spiced tomato gravy.

main-course.title: Chicken Biryani
main-course.description: Fragrant basmati rice cooked with marinated chicken pieces, spices, and herbs.

main-course.title: Paneer Tikka
main-course.description: Paneer cubes marinated in a spiced yogurt mixture and grilled until charred and smoky.

main-course.title: Egg Curry
main-course.description: Hard-boiled eggs cooked in a rich and flavorful gravy with onions, tomatoes, and spices.

side-course.title: Mango Pickle
side-course.description: Spicy and tangy mangoes pickled in mustard oil and spices.

side-course.title: Mixed Vegetable Pickle
side-course.description: Assorted vegetables pickled in a flavorful blend of spices and oil.

side-course.title: Chutney
side-course.description: A condiment made from fresh herbs, spices, and fruits, typically served as a side.

side-course.title: Pakora
side-course.description: Vegetables or meat coated in spiced chickpea flour batter and deep-fried.

side-course.title: Papadum
side-course.description: Thin and crispy lentil-based wafers served as an appetizer or accompaniment.

side-course.title: Cucumber Raita
side-course.description: Cooling yogurt mixed with fresh cucumbers, spices, and herbs.

side-course.title: Lime Pickle
side-course.description: Tangy lime pieces pickled with spices, typically served as a condiment.

side-course.title: Coconut Chutney
side-course.description: A South Indian condiment made from grated coconut, green chilies, and spices.

side-course.title: Onion Pakora
side-course.description: Sliced onions coated in spiced chickpea flour batter and deep-fried until crispy.

side-course.title: Mint Chutney
side-course.description: A refreshing condiment made from fresh mint leaves, green chilies, and spices.

drinks.title: Masala Chai
drinks.description: A spiced tea made by brewing black tea with aromatic Indian spices and herbs.

drinks.title: Lassi
drinks.description: A traditional yogurt-based drink, often flavored with fruit, spices, or herbs.

drinks.title: Nimbu Pani
drinks.description: A refreshing lemonade-like drink made with lemon juice, water, sugar, and spices.

drinks.title: Jaljeera
drinks.description: A tangy and spicy drink made from cumin, mint, tamarind, and other spices.

drinks.title: Thandai
drinks.description: A cooling milk-based drink flavored with nuts, spices, and rose water, often served during festivals like Holi.

drinks.title: Sugarcane Juice
drinks.description: Freshly extracted juice from sugarcane, often served with a dash of lime and ginger.

drinks.title: Aam Panna
drinks.description: A refreshing summer drink made from raw mangoes, flavored with spices like cumin and mint.

drinks.title: Rose Milk
drinks.description: A sweet and fragrant milk-based drink flavored with rose syrup.

drinks.title: Badam Milk
drinks.description: A rich and creamy milk drink flavored with almond paste, saffron, and cardamom.

drinks.title: Kokum Juice
drinks.description: A tart and refreshing drink made from kokum fruit, often consumed as a digestive aid.

drinks.title: Buttermilk
drinks.description: A savory yogurt-based drink, often flavored with spices like cumin and mint.

drinks.title: Sharbat
drinks.description: A sweet and flavorful syrup mixed with water or milk to make a refreshing drink.

drinks.title: Saffron Milk
drinks.description: A luxurious milk-based drink infused with saffron threads, often served warm.

drinks.title: Ginger Tea
drinks.description: A hot tea made by brewing black tea with fresh ginger, often sweetened with honey.

drinks.title: Butter Tea
drinks.description: A traditional Tibetan tea made with butter, salt, and yak milk, often consumed for warmth in cold climates.
